rules.ruleString: Unit was previously coded {AFF9611, AFX5611%, AFX9550%}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {AFF9611, AFG9072, AFX5611, AFX9550}
Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ACF5950, AFX9500} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: This unit aims to develop students' understanding of the concepts and techniques of management accounting, and skills in the use of management accounting techniques to communicate decision-useful information to management. The unit content includes costing terminology, cost accumulation and recording systems, costing methods for both manufacturing and service-based organisations, how management accounting information informs key product decisions such as pricing and product mix, and the design of budget systems.
